ratings.comment: Mary is the best professor I have had while here. She is so willing to help anyone and she makes the class material fun. I will definitely be taking another class with her. Make sure to read and go to screening because she will quiz you on what went in in screening!

Great professor. Easy going, makes material interesting...Have to participate in class...write about 3 papers (relatively short, 3-5 pages)...topics are interesting & engaging...should definitely take her
interesting class.  straight forward tests if you have a good memory. good screenings, except about 2.   i had a great TA but others don't seem so lucky
The class isn't hard, what will make you or break you is the right TA!! It is crucial to get a TA that won't be a jerk about grading your papers.  Avoid Ben.  Mary is great!

Interesting class. The exams are straight off the slides so make sure you write everything down and memorize everything. Papers are factually based and straight forward, but the TAs are inconsistent and can screw you over. She's very helpful if you go to her office hours. Great class!

Take this class! Very fun and easy to pass! The only thing you can get screwed over on is which TA you get cause they are far from consistent, so just make sure you do well on the tests, and that isn't hard.

Mary is a sweet lady. She loves and really cares about the material. The class itself was interesting. Some of the movie clips were a little boring, but most of them were fun! If you get a chance you should go to her office hours. She will do anything and everything she can to help you with her class and anything else you need help with.

A great class, with lots of interesting movie clips scattered throughout lectures.  There's a lot of material, but it provides a good overview of a lot of media areas. Worth taking as a "fun" class even if it's not your major.
Very nice. Cares about material and students. Nice teaching style; mostly power points. Tests were odd, but I did fairly well. I'm pretty sure my TA dissliked me highly, but Beltran was very nice.
Great introduction course if you are interested in the material. Beltran herself was great but her TAs had much to be desired so be aware that some of them are not sure what they are talking about.
Very good lecturer, helpful and nice  Topic material is interesting and lectures have plentiful video clips mized in to keep one engaged.  I highly recommend her class.
This teacher really cared about her students

Her power points dont seem to follow any outline format.  She throws out numbers and letters and doesnt give decent time to take notes.  Very monotone voice and seems like a strange woman.  Class is boring and she expects a lot on the papers.  Harder than expected, but survivable class.

Amazing class! The Prof is so helpful, and really, really cares about her students. She is organized and it's easy to follow in lecture. Interesting topic too, I mean who doesn't like a class about TV and movies?
somewhat disorganized and exams a lil tricky, but VERY helpful if ask for it and really cares about her students, wants everyone to do well
she is very nice but her lectures are unstructured and rather boring...not terribly hard but not easy...only take if you are really interested in the topic
